name: Lived and Learning
description:
A group of (very) amateur game developers hustled to make this game for the 2021 GoGodotJam. We plan on coming back to this later and actually making it a decent game. We're just happy we got a full game loop in :) Thanks for playing.

Instructions

Successfully complete the first challenge by "doing the right thing" and returning to the starting corridor to win the game. Enter doors using the doorknobs. The second door in the Challenge room doesn't go anywhere. Hint below if you need it.

Credits:

  • John Ryan - Programming
  • Abbey McLennan - Art and design
  • Sarah V. Hines - Story and design
  • Andrew Bowlby - Music and Sfx

p.s. thanks to Meg Ryan for the deck texture

HINT

Don't be a thief
